ygData.subject: RE: I give up
ygData.msgSnippet: We have quest?? Damn I thought they were a rumor.. :) I would love to see some nice quest items. Especially other black armor (besides Umbral, which I still
ygData.messageBody:
We have quest?? Damn I thought they were a rumor.. :)

I would love to see some nice quest items. Especially other black armor
(besides Umbral, which I still can't get). I'm using a combo of Crested,
Rubi and Charred now, and while the Red, Silver and Black looks good I'd
like to be in full black plate (especially if it only fits small races and
gives STR, DEX and AGI bonuses). You could give the Trolls/Ogres specialty
plate as well but make it give Int bonuses. If you think about it Warriors
just got a armor quest (very nice stuff btw), so it wouldn't be that
unfeasible for the SK's to get some.

Also something other than the DR or Fleshripper would be nice, (I have to go
with the DR mainly since the the FR has that AE spell which seems to just
help me piss off everything in a 10 sq mile radius).

Thom


-----Original Message-----
From: Brian Hook [mailto:bhook@...]
Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 1:42 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [shadowknight] I give up


So do you think that equipment quests are a viable alternative? I've
noticed that human (and DE?) SKs have a, uh, poor selection of quests =|

Brian
